name: RandomAnimeSuggestion
0:
”Alexa, open random anime.”
”Alexa, open random anime and give me an anime title.”
”Alexa, open random anime and tell me an anime.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: random anime
des: Chooses from a list of 100 popular anime titles and names one. Ask Alexa to open Random Anime to get the title of a top rated anime.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
